inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: diagnosed a year ago by any physician

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: presented to the ED with an asthma exacerbation judged by a physician to be of a moderate or severe degree

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Spirometry revealed a forced expiratory volume in the first second (FEV1) of 60% of the predicted

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
